meanings.definition: The action of going beyond what is allowed or expected.
meanings.sent1: Her exceedence of the speed limit resulted in a ticket.
meanings.sent2: The company's exceedence of the budget caused financial issues.
meanings.sent3: His exceedence of the dessert limit left him feeling guilty.
meanings.sent4: The student's exceedence of the word count was impressive.
meanings.sent5: The exceedence of the noise level made it hard to concentrate.

meanings.definition: The state of being greater than a specified amount or limit.
meanings.sent1: The exceedence of the population led to overcrowding.
meanings.sent2: The exceedence of the weight limit caused the bridge to collapse.
meanings.sent3: The exceedence of the cookie jar's capacity made it overflow.
meanings.sent4: The exceedence of the temperature made it unbearable to stay outside.
meanings.sent5: The exceedence of the speed record was celebrated by all.
